user_instruction: 'Tell John to send an email introducing himself to me (sarah@zenithinnovations.com). Tell him to check out his Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Quick Introduction & Notion Review  

Hi John,

Hope you’re doing well! When you have a moment, could you please send a brief email introducing yourself to me at sarah@zenithinnovations.com?  
Also, please take a look at your Notion workspace for project background information.

Looking forward to working together.

Thank you!

Best,  
Sarah

final_output:
